column4: Does anyone know how to "clone" an Ubuntu Installation?  Copy all system settings, all installed programs, all system and program preferences to another computer???
Does anyone know how to "clone" an Ubuntu Installation?  Copy all system settings, all installed programs, all system and program preferences to another computer???
Is there a website that can walk me through this process???  I'm a noob at this stuff.
is the other machine the same hardware?
